metadata.name: Triple Cross eBPF Rootkit Install Commands
metadata.comment: Detects default install commands of the Triple Cross eBPF rootkit based on the "deployer.sh" script

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sudo')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' tc ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' enp0s3 ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' qdisc ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' filter '))))

output.summary: Detects default install commands of the Triple Cross eBPF rootkit based on the "deployer.sh" script
